# The `UndefVarError` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

### convertToErrorCode() {#a18e3d79cb7b6d35faefc110e8b0af889}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::UndefVarError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.
